name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Python Engineer with 8 years of experience, specializing in **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **Microservices** for developing scalable solutions. Proficient in designing APIs adhering to **REST** and **gRPC** principles, and defining specifications with **OpenAPI**. Experienced in deploying applications using **Docker** and orchestrating them with **Kubernetes**. Skilled in leveraging modern cloud services on **AWS** to build resilient architectures.

Adept in CI/CD practices using **GitHub Actions**, **Terraform**, and **CDK**, ensuring seamless deployment and version control while effectively collaborating with cross-functional teams. My projects have consistently met compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS, evidencing my commitment to secure and robust software development.

I have a proven track record of integrating **GenAI** solutions using **LangChain** and **LangGraph** for innovative features, alongside a solid background in testing, code reviews, and strong communication skills that enhance team dynamics and project outcomes.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and deployed microservices using **Python** and **FastAPI**, ensuring high performance and scalability across diverse applications while maintaining adherence to best practices for **REST** and **gRPC**.
- Led the design and implementation of CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitHub Actions** and automation tools, enhancing deployment efficiency and reducing error rates by **30%**.
- Architected and containerized applications with **Docker** and orchestrated them using **Kubernetes** for improved service reliability and management, achieving deployment speeds of up to **5** times faster.
- Integrated **GenAI**, **LangChain**, and **LangGraph** within existing systems to elevate user experience through intelligent automation and personalized interactions.
- Enhanced system monitoring and logging with tools like **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, providing metrics that increased uptime by **15%**.
- Established a robust version control strategy leveraging **Terraform** and **CDK** to streamline infrastructure management across multiple environments.
- Conducted thorough code reviews and implemented testing frameworks to ensure software quality and reliability, covering unit and integration tests for both front-end and back-end services.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define API specifications using **OpenAPI**, enabling clear documentation and streamlined communication of interfaces.
- Communicated effectively with stakeholders to gather requirements and provide updates, ensuring alignment and transparency throughout project cycles.
- Fostered continuous learning and development opportunities for team members, enhancing overall team performance and communication skills.

Demonstrated expertise in **Python**, developing robust applications using **FastAPI** within a microservices architecture to enhance system scalability and throughput for high-volume transactions.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs following **OpenAPI** standards, enabling seamless integrations and efficient communication between services and clients.
Utilized **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration, ensuring high availability and scalability across the development and production environments.
Adopted CI/CD practices using **GitHub Actions** and **Terraform** to streamline deployment processes, reducing deployment times by **30%** and enhancing overall reliability.
Implemented comprehensive testing frameworks to maintain code quality and performance, conducting code reviews and ensuring adherence to best practices in version control.
Communicated effectively with cross-functional teams to align on project requirements and objectives, facilitating a collaborative environment that led to improved output and innovation.
Leveraged **GenAI**, **LangChain**, and **LangGraph** technologies to enhance the application features, demonstrating capability in integrating advanced solutions into existing infrastructures.
Actively participated in knowledge sharing sessions and workshops, strengthening team abilities and fostering a culture of continuous learning and development.

• Designed and optimized microservices using **Python** with **FastAPI** and **Django**, ensuring high availability and scalability for a global e-commerce platform.
• Developed robust **REST** APIs and integrated **gRPC** protocols to enhance service communication across the checkout, cart, and order fulfillment modules.
• Utilized **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, enabling seamless deployment workflows and ensuring version control through **GitHub Actions**.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines enhancing deployment efficiency by **30%**, contributing to timely feature releases and reduced downtime.
• Created real-time functionalities with **WebSockets** and event-driven architectures powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, facilitating timely order updates and dynamic inventory tracking.
• Engineered fault-tolerant data access using **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra**, supporting high-traffic workflows with a **99.9%** uptime.
• Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation systems leveraging **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow**, improving conversion rates by **25%** through personalized user experiences.
• Established feature flags and blue-green deployments with **LaunchDarkly** to enable controlled rollouts, significantly reducing user impact during updates.
• Developed user interfaces using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, ensuring responsive designs optimized for mobile-first engagement.
• Built secure payment workflows with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, maintaining compliance with PCI standards for sensitive data handling.
• Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** practices to secure data access, ensuring GDPR compliance and safeguarding user information throughout the platform.
